Description.Name: Need a Lift?
Description.Details: You wander into the lounge for a drink and hopefully some relaxing music. As you look around the crowded room, you easily notice the large form of a Ghost Bear MechWarrior motioning you to come join {TGT_MW.Obj}. You stroll over and sit down across from [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] who effortlessly reaches across the table and politely slaps your shoulder, "Greetings, Commander {COMMANDER.FirstName} {COMMANDER.LastName}, How are you this evening?" You stifle the wince on your face from the friendly slap, knowing its sting will leave a mark but not wanting to show any weakness to a man who commanded 1000's of warriors as Khan of Clan Ghost Bear, "I'm fine, thank you. How are you?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] pastes a big smile on {TGT_MW.Det} face, "I am very well, thank you for asking Commander. Have you ever tried [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_GhostBeer],Ghost Beer]]?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] holds up a massive pitcher of what looks like nothing but soda water. You look at it and shake you head, "Umm, no, no I have not. It looks like soda water." {TGT_MW.Subj_C} grabs an empty tankard and fills it to the top, the clear liquid foaming over the edge the same way a normal beer would. {TGT_MW.Det_C} smile nearly splits {TGT_MW.Det} face as {TGT_MW.Subj} pushes the drink over to you, and hoists {TGT_MW.Det} own full tankard, "As you say in the Inner Sphere, Cheers!" You grab the offered tankard and carefully take a sniff. Your eyes instantly water, offering you a valuable insight as to the potentcy of this particular beverage. Not wanting to insult, you raise the tankard and tap it against {TGT_MW.Det}, "Cheers!" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] downs nearly half the tankard in one mouthful. You try to mimic {TGT_MW.Obj}, but only manage the smallest of sips as the fiery liquid burns down your throat. The coughing spasms wrack your body for what seems like forever before you catch your breath, "Wha... What the bloody hell is in that?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] laughs, but not in a mocking way. "It does take some getting used to. It is distilled from a grain that grows on Arcadia that is as white as driven snow. The closest way to describe it would possibly be pure carbonated vodka. It will warm your belly and put hair on your chest! You want more, quiaff?" You're still catching your breath and politely respond, "Uh... Neg. Let me take my time and finish this tankard first." [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] nods, empties {TGT_MW.Det} tankard and refills it, "I have been wanting to speak to you for awhile, Commander. I have a favour to ask and was hoping you would be willing to assist me." You nod your head, "Go on, tell me what you need and if it's reasonable we can see about accommodating you." "I do not easily trust those who are not Clan Ghost Bear. You, Commander, and your company, have shown similar tenets to those of my Clan: Strength, Family and Patience. It is because of this, I feel I can trust you with what I need help with." [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] says before pausing to take another drink. You carefully sip your drink before speaking, "Thank you for your comments, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]. Please continue, what is it you need from {COMPANY.CompanyName}?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] looks at you evenly, "Commander, I humbly ask you to assist me in collecting my mech from storage." A confused look crosses your face, "Why is your mech in storage? And for that matter, why don't you just ask Yang to get the techs to ready it?" "Neg, Commander. MY mech is not onboard the Argo. It is where I left it, back in clan space. I appreciate you giving me one of the {COMPANY.CompanyName} mechs to pilot, but I am now ready to pilot my mech again." You sit back in your chair, digesting this information, "May I ask why you left your mech behind in the first place?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] clears {TGT_MW.Det} throat, "The various clans have differing views on those who are not clan. To that end, I decided to travel away from my clan and experience the Inner Sphere under a different set of eyes. To have done so whilst also piloting a customised 100 ton Kodiak would have skewed all perceptions of me and those I have met along the way. I have gained perspective, and seen with my own eyes and heart that just because you are not clan, it does not mean you cannot embody the spirit of being clan. I can see that in how you command your crew and company. I wish to continue experiencing the Inner Sphere with you and {COMPANY.CompanyName}. With my mech, I can be a much more valuable asset for you to have at your disposal." "Wow, that is a lot to take in. Which system in particular are we needing to travel to?" you ask. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] calmly looks you straight in the eyes, "I cannot divulge that information until you give me your word that you will assist, Commander."

Description.Name: Postponed
Description.Details: You calmly look over at [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], "Look, I appreciate your request and the addition of a clan assault mech to the company would be amazing, but we have too much on our plate to even attempt a recovery mission right now. I hope you understand." The silence lingers and you begin to feel a bit intimidated as [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s unwavering stare bores into you. A few seconds later, a huge smile spreads across {TGT_MW.Det} face as {TGT_MW.Subj} picks up the pitcher of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_GhostBeer],Ghost Beer]] and refills both tankards, "You are the Commander, and you have declared we wait. We shall wait until the time is right Commander, quiaff?" You reluctantly grab your tankard and clink it against {TGT_MW.Det} raised tankard, "Aff, MechWarrior."

Description.Name: Give it to me baby!
Description.Details: Maybe it's the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_GhostBeer],Ghost Beer]] talking, but you are intrigued by the thought of having a 100 ton Kodiak at your disposal, and with an experienced pilot to boot. You take another small sip of your drink and smile, "Ok [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], let's say I agree to your request. You understand that heading out to clan space will take time, so this will not be a fast turn around mission?" [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] smiles and nods, "Aff, Commander. Ultimately, I am placing my faith in you honouring your word to assist me. In return, I will give my all to any missions I drop for {COMPANY.CompanyName}." "Okay MechWarrior, you have my word. We will at some point head out to clan space to retreive your Kodiak. Do you trust me enough to provide the name of the star system? [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] finishes {TGT_MW.Det} drink and sets the tankard down on the table, "We need to go to Arcadia. A very remote location in the southern hemisphere to be a bit more precise. When we arrive in system, I can provide more exact coordinates." You lean forward, hand extended, "This is where I think I should respond with, Bargained well and done." A massive grin spreads across [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s face as {TGT_MW.Subj} nearly breaks your outstretched hand with {TGT_MW.Det} grasp, "Aff, Commander! Bargained well and done!" You bid your farewell and stagger back to your cabin, the effects of just one tankard of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_GhostBeer],Ghost Beer]] nearly buckling your knees. You hope the inevitable hangover doesn't last too long while you ponder how the hell [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] can still function after polishing of nearly that whole pitcher.
